== Salvador do Mundo (CT) (626702) ==

Salvador do Mundo (CT) is a town in the [[BARDEZ 002]] taluka of [[NORTH GOA]] district with an area of 11.59 sq. km. and harbouring 1516 households with total population of 6373 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 7 km. The state headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 7 km. Male population is 3228 and female population is 3145. Scheduled Caste population is 201 and Scheduled Tribes population is 150. Census Location Code of the town is 626702<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is BELGAUM at a distance of 180 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is PUNE at a distance of 475 km. Railway station is at CARAMBOLIM at a distance of 15 km.

== Sanitation and Drinking Water ==  
The town has open drainage system.
Water is supplied from a service reservoir. The town gets it water as tap water from a treated source. The capacity of the water supply system is 2000 kilo-litres.

The nearest fire fighting service is at MAPUSA (12 km) .
